home.title: Don't be overwhelmed by the weather anymore !
home.description: Our {{ appName }} solution brings you real-time temperatures of cities all around the world, as well as weather forecasts for the upcoming days quickly and for free.

weatherForecast.noSearchDescription: Search for the name of your city to get the forecasts !
weatherForecast.noResultsDescription: The search did not yield any results. You may have misspelled, or the city may not exist
